EmailTemplate.name: GS Bulk Auto response
EmailTemplate.subject: We have received your request #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hej! Vad kul att du hör av dig och är intresserad av att resa med SAS!
Hei! Så fint å høre fra deg og at du er interessert i å reise med SAS!
Hej! Tak for din henvendelse og tak for at du er interesseret i at rejse med SAS!
--
Hi!
Great to hear from you and that you are interested to travel with SAS!
Your request is #{​​​​​​​!Case.CaseNumber}​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ and we will answer you as soon as possible.
While you are waiting to hear from us, you may take a look at www.flysas.com for travel inspiration!
Best Regards SAS Group Sales SAS Customer Service
Monday – Friday 09.00 – 17.00 Phone: 0871 226 7757 (£0.10 per minute + network extras)
{!Case.Thread_Id}
